title: What is deep fake technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you ever heard about the DEEPFAKE technology.? The word DEEPFAKE is made of two words: Deep learning and Fake. It is an Artificial intelligence programme which can make fake videos which look and sound just like real videos. There is no way you can differentiate between what is real and what is fake! Let me show you some images of the same to illustrate how deepfake works.  The image above shows how deepfake software analyse the facial patterns and voice of an individual and then can insert words spoken by any other person in the exact voice of the person who is getting targeted! Source : Google.

Deep fake is an output of one category of the Deep Learning Models called the Generative Models and in that category the most famous is GAN (Generative Adversarial Network). Now It has become so famous that people have started using it as a packaged software. You have tasks like identifying whether the doc/image/video is fake or real.
